wexpman.persistencelayer.db.connectionmanagers

Class Db4oTemplateForEmbeddedServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • wexpman.persistencelayer.db.connectionmanagers.Db4oTemplateForEmbeddedServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springmodules.db4o.Db4oOperations

    public class Db4oTemplateForEmbeddedServer
extends Object
implements org.springmodules.db4o.Db4oOperations
    DAO template for Db4o Embedded Server mode Db4oTemplate supplied by springmodules is suited to single access in standalone applications, here I need embedded server mode. Based on springmodules Db4oTemplate
    Author:
    Matias Alberto Gavinowich

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Db4oTemplateForEmbeddedServer(com.db4o.ObjectServer server)
      Constructs the template Modified class so that it supports embedded server mode

      • convertDb4oAccessException

        public org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException convertDb4oAccessException(Exception ex)
        From Db4oAccessor Convert the given Db4o Exception to an appropriate exception from the org.springframework.dao hierarchy.

        May be overridden in subclasses.

        Parameters:
        ex - RuntimeException that occurred
        Returns:
        the corresponding DataAccessException instance
